cn.org.rapid_framework.generator.util.paranamer
接口 Paranamer

所有已知实现类：
AdaptiveParanamer, BytecodeReadingParanamer, CachingParanamer, DefaultParanamer, JavadocParanamer, JavaSourceParanamer, NullParanamer
public interface Paranamer

Paranamer allows lookups of methods and constructors by parameter names.

作者：
Paul Hammant, Mauro Talevi

字段摘要
static java.lang.String[] EMPTY_NAMES
           
 
方法摘要
 java.lang.String[] lookupParameterNames(java.lang.reflect.AccessibleObject methodOrConstructor)
          Lookup the parameter names of a given method.
 java.lang.String[] lookupParameterNames(java.lang.reflect.AccessibleObject methodOrConstructor, boolean throwExceptionIfMissing)
          Lookup the parameter names of a given method.
 

字段详细信息

EMPTY_NAMES

static final java.lang.String[] EMPTY_NAMES
方法详细信息

lookupParameterNames

java.lang.String[] lookupParameterNames(java.lang.reflect.AccessibleObject methodOrConstructor)
Lookup the parameter names of a given method.

参数：
methodOrConstructor - the Method or Constructor for which the parameter names are looked up.
返回：
A list of the parameter names.
抛出：
ParameterNamesNotFoundException - if no parameter names were found.
java.lang.NullPointerException - if the parameter is null.
java.lang.SecurityException - if reflection is not permitted on the containing Class of the parameter

lookupParameterNames

java.lang.String[] lookupParameterNames(java.lang.reflect.AccessibleObject methodOrConstructor,
                                        boolean throwExceptionIfMissing)
Lookup the parameter names of a given method.

参数：
methodOrConstructor - the Method or Constructor for which the parameter names are looked up.
throwExceptionIfMissing - whether to throw an exception if no Paranamer data found (versus return null).
返回：
A list of the parameter names.
抛出：
ParameterNamesNotFoundException - if no parameter names were found.
java.lang.NullPointerException - if the parameter is null.
java.lang.SecurityException - if reflection is not permitted on the containing Class of the parameter
